title: KATE ROUND CUT, 3.75MM LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description:
Our Kate rivière necklace makes a striking comeback as an everyday staple. What was once reserved for special moments, the single-strand lab-grown white sapphire necklace is reimagined with individually set white sapphire gemstones and a custom clasp to elevate your every look. Even the most discerning jewelry eye will do a double take. She was carefully designed with a fine jewelry design and custom clasp.
As seen in Vogue. As seen on Justin Bieber.
details:
Metal: 18k Gold-coated Sterling Silver
Setting: 4-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3.75MM



15 inches, 20.00 CTW DEW
16 inches, 20.80 CTW DEW
